attributes.additional_details:
The elected government, with all major parties will define regulations around communication and dissemination of positive, policy lead information during elections and set in place a structure of formal penalisation and reprimand for any political associate breaking these regulations.

Curtail all discussion that does not relate to the efficacy of a political party, individual or policy, ban personal attacks and leaking sensitive or personal information with respect to parties or elected officials where there are no legal grounds for such.

Voter apathy has increased exponentially during the last generation due to a lack of clear information and the vilification of all political parties.

Help us to believe in our democracy again and build an election process we can be proud of.
